It provides convenient text input. With it, you can set color and underlie for specific chars.

Imports

../thirdparty/opengl, ../thirdparty/opengl/glut, ../core/vector2, ../core/rect2, ../core/anchor, ../core/input, ../core/enums, ../core/color, ../core/color_text, ../nodes/node, control

Types

RichEditTextObj = object of ControlRef
  blit_caret*: bool
  blit_speed*: float
  blit_time*: float
  caret_position*: int
  font*: pointer               ## Glut font data.
  spacing*: float              ## Font spacing.
  size*: float                 ## Font size.
  text*: ColorTextRef
  hint_text*: ColorTextRef
  caret_color*: ColorRef
  text_align*: AnchorRef       ## Text align.
  on_edit*: proc (pressed_key: string): void ## This called when user press any key.
  
RichEditTextRef = ref RichEditTextObj

Procs

proc RichEditText(name: string = "RichEditText"): RichEditTextRef {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}

Creates a new RichEditText.

Arguments:

  • name is a node name.

Examples:

var text = RichEditText("RichEditText")
